quote.issued_shares_note: The number of issued shares has been adjusted for the announced rights issue of 5 rights shares for every 1 consolidated share with an ex-date of 20 August 2025. The number of issued shares before the adjustment is 51,145,772 shares as at 31 August 2025.
quote.summary: Risecomm Group Holdings Ltd is an investment holding company principally engaged in the research, development, production and sales of power line communication products and the provision of smart manufacturing & industrial automation services (SMIA) and products. The Company operates through three segments. The Automated Meter Reading (AMR) and Other Business segment is engaged in the design, development and sales of power-line communication products, energy saving and environmental protection products and solutions, the provision of maintenance services in connection with the deployment and upgrading of AMR systems by power grid companies. The SMIA Business segment is engaged in the sales of software license, production safety products, construction contracts and provision of software post-contract customer support services. The Wind Farm Operation and Maintenance (WFOM) Business segment provides wind farm operation and maintenance services.
